channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sharon Osbourne Reveals Why She Didn't Follow Through on Assisted Suicide Pact with Ozzy When He Died
item.description: Sharon first revealed their pact in her 2007 memoir 'Survivor: My Story - The Next Chapter'

item.title: Whoopi Goldberg Slams Donald Trump for Rob Reiner Remarks While Drawing Parallels to Charlie Kirk: 'Can You Get Any Lower?'
item.description: Trump claimed Reiner died from "the anger he caused others" and said the director suffered from "Trump Derangement Syndrome"

item.title: What Happened to Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner? What We Know So Far About Their Deaths
item.description: Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner, were found dead in their Los Angeles home on Dec. 14

item.title: Guy Pearce's Apology for Antisemitic Posts Resurfaces 2 Weeks Later After Deadly Shooting Targets Jewish Community in Australia
item.description: The Australian actor apologized for causing "confusion and distress" by sharing offensive "inaccurate content" in November

item.title: John Stamos Honors 'Giants of Our Craft' Anthony Geary and Rob Reiner Following TheirÂ Deaths: 'Heartbreaking'
item.description: Both Geary and Rob died at 78 on Dec. 14. The soap star died following complications from an operation while Rob and his wife were killed by their son
